DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose clinical trial evaluate change International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) total score beginning study end study subject randomize tadalafil 5mg day dose placebo day dose 12 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Investigating Safety Efficacy Tadalafil Treatment Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia ( BPH ) Asian Men
DOC.criteria: Have Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms ( BPHLUTS ) least 6 month prior Visit 1 . Agree use approve experimental treatment erectile dysfunction BPHLUTS study . Have take Finasteride therapy least 3 month prior Visit 2 . Have take Dutasteride therapy least 6 month prior Visit 2 . Have International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) total score great equal 13 Visit 2 . Prostate Specific Antigen ( PSA ) great 10.0 nanogram per milliliter ( ng/mL ) Visit 1 . Bladder Post Void Residual ( PVR ) great equal 300 mL ultrasound Visit 1 . History pelvic surgery , prostatectomy , radiotherapy , penile implant surgery , low urinary tract malignancy trauma . Urinary tract infection inflammation current antibiotic therapy urinary tract infection Visit 1 . Glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) great 9 % Visit 1 .
